thread.title: Cancel Your Apple Music Sub Today Before Auto Renew Charges You $9.99
thread.title_full: Cancel Your Apple Music Sub Today Before Auto Renew Charges You $9.99

title: Cancel Your Apple Music Sub Today Before Auto Renew Charges You $9.99
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
1 Oct 2015 07:32 AM EST 
Like many subscriptions services that perform the same trick, Apple Music’s free trial is about to expire and charge you for automatically renewing your subscription. So, if you partook in Apple’s grand music experiment and don’t want to keep the Bunsen burners lit, today’s the day to cancel and go back to Spotify or that other method of obtaining music that years of being a poor college student taught you how to do pretty well. The initial trial offer lasted for three months, and will now charge $9.99 per month when September rolls over to October.
